title: [Extension Proposal] digma-quarkus-opentelemetry

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

[digma.ai](http://digma.ai) wants to extend the existing [quarkus-opentelemetry](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/tree/main/extensions/opentelemetry) ,
mainly by adding span attributes for the web controller - and its mapped method (and class).
see [OTEL Semantic conventions for Source Code attributes](https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-specification/blob/main/specification/trace/semantic_conventions/span-general.md#source-code-attributes)

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

### Repository name

digma-quarkus-opentelemetry

### Short description

add span attributes of code.function and code.namespace

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/digma-quarkus-opentelemetry/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- opentelemetry


### Team Members

- @arik-dig
- @doppleware

### GitHub Applications?

- [ ] [Stale](https://github.com/marketplace/stale) - Automatically close stale Issues and Pull Requests that tend to accumulate during a project

### Additional context

_No response_
